notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Q.Z. conceived the study and designed the methodology; Y.W. and Z.L. contributed to the writing and editing of the manuscript; J.W., X.C., X.L., and A.M. collected the data; Q.M., H.Y., and W.L. analyzed the data; and Q.Z. wrote the manuscript. All authors contributed substantially to the preparation of drafts and approved the final manuscript for submission.
